title: 16152 E Hinsdale Ln
neighborhood: Aurora- Creek View II at River Run
posting_body: AREA: Aurora-Creek View II at River Run!
Gorgeous home with a fantastic location backing to Cherry Creek Valley Ecological Park and on a quiet cul-de-sac.
The family room and Master suite both with a cozy gas fireplace.
Spacious, bright master bedroom with mountain views, en Suite and sitting area.
INCLUDED WITH RENT: Trash service via the HOA.
All other utilities paid by tenant.
KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave.
FLOORING: Vinyl floors (wood feel) and carpet flooring
HEAT/COOLING: Gas heat and central AC!
FENCING: Fully fenced with large patio!
RESTRICTIONS: 2 small pets (under 30 lbs) considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
Initial leases are to end between April and June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
